perturbation.original_text: 1.DGT shall pay Dolphin USD10,000, for carrying out the beta testing of the quality of their photo-editing services and testing of the Internet bandwidth for file transmission. This amount is to be paid in two monthly installments, USD5,000 on the date of this Agreement and USD5,000, 30 days subsequent to the date of this Agreement;
perturbation.changed_text: 1.DGT shall pay Dolphin USD10,000, for carrying out the beta testing of the quality of their photo-editing services and testing of the Internet bandwidth for file transmission. This amount is to be paid in two monthly installments, USD5,000 on the date of this Agreement and USD5,000, 60 days subsequent to the date of this Agreement;
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the payment deadline for the second installment. Initially, the payment was due 30 days after the agreement date. Now, it's shifted to 60 days. This creates uncertainty about the correct payment deadline and potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Dolphin shall be entitled to terminate this Agreement only after DGT fails to meet a material obligation hereunder and only after Dolphin has given DGT written notice of such failure and only after the DGT has not rectified such failure within 30 days of the notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Dolphin shall be entitled to terminate this Agreement only after DGT fails to meet a material obligation hereunder and only after Dolphin has given DGT written notice of such failure and only after the DGT has not rectified such failure within 15 days of the notice.
perturbation.explanation: This change alters the period DGT has to rectify a failure after notice from Dolphin before Dolphin can terminate the agreement. The original text gives DGT 30 days, while the modified text shortens this to 15 days, creating a contradiction in the termination terms.

perturbation.original_text: Dolphin agrees to complete its photo-editing services within 14 days of receiving the original digital photo files.
perturbation.changed_text: Dolphin agrees to complete its photo-editing services within 7 days of receiving the original digital photo files.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that Dolphin has 14 days to complete photo-editing services after receiving the digital files. The modified text shortens this timeframe to 7 days. This introduces a contradiction regarding the allowed turnaround time for photo editing, potentially leading to disputes over service level expectations and breach of contract claims.
